siteMetadata.title: Performa Biennial 2023
siteMetadata.description: Founded by art historian and curator RoseLee Goldberg, Performa is the leading organization dedicated to exploring the critical role of live performance in the history of twentieth-century art and to encouraging new directions in performance for the twenty-first century.
siteMetadata.author: @performanyc
siteMetadata.keywords: performance, nyc, dance, art, avant-garde, events
